HI, {!Contact.Name}
We hope you're enjoying the benefits of your new home solar system!
We're checking in with an exciting, limited time offer!
We have partnered with a local credit union - Shrewsbury Federal Credit Union - and, for a limited time, Shrewsbury is offering BlueWave customers $100 to sign up for one of their banking products. This offer includes:
• No-cost Checking Account
• No-cost Savings or Money Market Accounts
• No-cost Holiday Club Accounts
• CDs
• IRAs
Shrewsbury was voted the #1 Community Bank in 2016, and we're excited they're providing this local offer exclusively to BlueWave solar loan customers.
To learn more about this offer and how to earn $100, click the button below and we'll get in touch right away.
Learn More
Thanks for joining us to make 'Solar for the 100%' not just a mission, but a reality.
- All of us here at BlueWave
Our mailing address is: 111 Huntington Ave, Suite 650 Boston, MA 02199
